name: Swagg Moines
description:
Swagg Moines is a party game realized for the 43th Ludum Dare .  Let's  embody monks who throw crosses on each other !

Playable only with 2 controllers on PC !

Corentin HAAG : fx - 3D Artist - Environment Designer

Paul HEBBINCKUYS : Programming - Sound Design - Music Composition -                                                                         Animation -Ui
